data.text:
Amazing breakfast very nice Customer service we really happy and we will be back to this place again thank you
Little bit far from the port but if you have a car, it’s only five minutes drive
Beautiful view, and you can see kos Island 
From your room
data.title: Thank you

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Dear guest,
First of all, thank you for taking the time to share this kind comment with us. Your kind words are the biggest motivation for us.
We are proud to be one of the most popular hotels in Bodrum with the breathtaking views, quality of service and our friendly colleagues.
 We hope to welcome you back soon.
Esra GENÇER
Guest Relations Agent
Holiday Inn Resort Bodrum
owner_response.author: Esra Gencer

data.text:
Truly great location, spacious rooms, decent service.
In one of Bodrums most scenic spots, very cozy, great support and service staff and management you don’t want to miss this gem. We chose the breakfast option that has quite a variety and really fresh and delicious.
data.title: Great place to stay

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Dear Guest,
Thank you so much for taking the time to provide a review of your experience  at Holiday Inn Resort Hotel, Bodrum. Your kind words are the biggest motivation for us. 
We are proud to be one of the most popular hotels in Bodrum with the breathtaking views, quality of service and our friendly colleagues.
Hoping to welcome you again as soon as possible
Esra GENÇER

Holiday Inn Resort Bodrum
owner_response.author: Esra Gencer

data.text: Everything was perfect. Breakfast was delicious. Rooms and towels are always clean. The view was amazing. It was so good to watch the Bodrum castle. Staf was so nice. We enjoyed with my friends. They were so kind and friendy. I will come at summer with my family.
data.title: Perfect holiday

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Dear Guest,
Thank you so much for taking the time to provide a review of your experience  at Holiday Inn Resort Hotel, Bodrum. Your kind words are the greatest motivation for us.
We are delighted that you were satisfied with our hotel during your holiday.
Hoping to welcome you again as soon as possible
Esra GENÇER
Guest Relations
Holiday Inn Resort Bodrum
owner_response.author: Esra Gencer

data.text: VeryPoor Hospitality and Rude Staff and Lift not Working Not At all Maintained Swimming Pool and Half of the Amenities in the Room and in the hotel is not functioning Breakfast is very Bad Not All recommended Hotel and this hotel does not deserve to call itself 5star.Except for the Location for the Hotel..Nothing was Good
data.title: Boring Experience of Holdiay Inn Bodrum

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Dear Guest,
First of all thank you for your comment. All positive and negative feedback is important to us. Our employees do their best to provide the best service to our valued guests. We can never accept a situation such as misbehaving or making fun of others.
As you mentioned, it is true that our elevator is not working because this elevator is an open-air elevator and it was closed because we thought of you, our guests, as it would be dangerous to operate in a storm. Additionally, our elevator in the main building is operational.
With the end of the summer season, our pool was closed to use at the end of October.
There are 2 bottles of water available in our rooms as a complimentary service.
Regarding breakfast, we have difficulty understanding the complaints you make about breakfast without trying our breakfast. Because, as you know, the cooks belonging to your group have prepared breakfast for you. Therefore, if you have any complaints, it would be healthier for you to report it to your own chefs. 

Esra GENCER
Guest Relations 
Holiday Inn Resort
owner_response.author: Esra Gencer

data.text: Worst , worst, Terrible, No Hospitality, staff is useless, insufficient, incompetent, Non cooperative , No one understands English, not worth to spend on this hotel, please don’t opt this hotel. This is original review
data.title: NO ONE SHOULD OPT THIS AS NO RESPECT FOR CUSTOMERS THE STAFFS ARE MOCKING THE CLIENTS . It’s my worst experience.

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Dear Guest,
We are very sorry that you were not satisfied with your stay in our hotel. Please ensure that all your constructive points are considered and implemented accordingly. However, it is out of the question for our team, who prioritizes guest satisfaction above all else and strives to ensure that you enjoy your holiday and leave with good memories, to do such a thing. We would be happy to welcome you back to our facility in the future to show that we can offer services and facilities that meet your expectations.
Kind Regards
owner_response.author: Esra Gencer
